channel.title: Online NPC help

item.title: Online NPC help
item.dc:creator: @i_noob_iii i noob iii
item.description:
@i_noob_iii wrote:

those brackets really shouldnt be there…

anyway try this.

}
   } else if (npcs.npcType == 3084) {
        if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) {
                npcs.UpdateRequired = true;
                npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
                if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("F 3 A  R D")) {
                        npcs.textUpdate = "F 3 A  R D is online!"; 
      } else {
                        npcs.textUpdate = "F 3 A  R D is offline!";                        
      }
}
}

what base are you using?..

Read full topic

item.description:

Full code:
}
} else if (npcs.npcType == 3084) }
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) {
npcs.UpdateRequired = true {
npcs.textUpdateRequired = true {
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“F 3 A R D”)) {
npcs.textUpdate = “F 3 A R D is online!” }
} else {
npcs.textUpdate = “F 3 A R D is offline!” }
}
}

item.title: Online NPC help
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

Use the following format (I think):

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2253) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("F 3 A R D")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "F 3 A R D is online!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "F 3 A R D is offline!"; } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Online NPC help
item.dc:creator: @funyou funyou
item.description:
@funyou wrote:

I want an NPC of mine to say when Im Offline or Online. How do I do this? This is what I already have:
} else if (npcs.npcType == 3084) {
if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) // this is the time delay
{
npcs.updateRequired = true;
npcs.textupdateRequired = true }
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“F 3 A R D”))
npcs.textUp
}
}

The compiler reports an error with line 1, and 5. ANY HELP PLZ?

Read full topic
